org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.dialect.internal

Class BasicDialectResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.dialect.spi.AbstractDatabaseMetaDataDialectResolver
      • org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.dialect.internal.BasicDialectResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, DatabaseMetaDataDialectResolver, DialectResolver, Service
    Deprecated. 
    Purpose has shifted to new DatabaseInfoDialectResolver contract. See HHH-7965 for details.

    @Deprecated
public class BasicDialectResolver
extends AbstractDatabaseMetaDataDialectResolver
    Intended as support for custom resolvers.
    See Also:

        protected final Dialect resolveDialectInternal(DatabaseMetaData metaData)
